title: Second reading of PTA passes in Parliament
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); 86 voted in favor and 35 voted against the second reading of the Prevention of Terrorism (Temporary Provisions) (Amendment) Bill, at the Parliament today (22).
Accordingly, the committee stage is set to commence with regard to the bill.
No legal issues in approaching IMF: Minister (Dr) Ramesh Pathirana
Access to counsel, right to communication with next of kin among new amendments to PTA
